content:
CompensationToken Class

Definition

Provides a means to explicitly confirm or compensate a CompensableActivity once the stem.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body* of the CompensableActivity has successfully completed.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public sealed class CompensationToken
Inheritance
Object
CompensationToken
Attributes
DataContractAttribute

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()

Remarks

For more information, see Compensation Programming Model.
